name: Wispr Flow
description: AI dictation product that converts speech into polished text across Mac, Windows, iPhone, and newly launched Android.
why_matters: Launched Android on Feb 23, 2026 and claims 4x typing speed (220 vs 45 wpm), signaling strong cross-platform voice productivity demand.

name: Callio
description: API gateway and marketplace that lets AI agents discover and execute multiple third-party APIs through one endpoint.
why_matters: Listed on Feb 23 Product Hunt and advertises 50+ APIs with one key and sub-2-minute setup, reducing integration overhead for agent builders.

name: Siteline
description: Analytics tool focused on AI-agent and bot traffic, helping teams improve visibility in AI-driven discovery channels.
why_matters: Surfaced on Feb 23 Product Hunt with 512 upvotes and states 30% of web traffic is already bot/agent-driven, matching current SEO shifts.

name: Modelence App Builder
description: AI app builder for shipping production apps with built-in auth, database primitives, and observability defaults.
why_matters: Ranked on Feb 24 Product Hunt with 352 upvotes and positions itself as production-ready by default, not prototype-only tooling.

name: Orchids 1.0
description: AI app builder that supports multi-stack generation and lets users bring existing model subscriptions or API keys.
why_matters: Announced Feb 9 and remained hot on Feb 24 Product Hunt; claims 1M+ users and benchmark lead (76% App Bench), indicating rapid adoption.
